entry.title: Dogecoin, Bitcoin Pump as GameStop Rally Cools
entry.summary: In the wake of a meme stock and meme coin frenzy, old-school cryptocurrencies are doing remarkably well.

entry.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Network Blast Reveals Airdrop Details
entry.summary: The Blast airdrop finally has a firm date, but it’s later than expected. More Ethereum tokens will be handed out as a make-good, however.

entry.title: Hedge Fund Nabbed Millions of GameStop, AMC Shares Before Meme Stocks Skyrocketed
entry.summary: The Renaissance Technologies portfolio also included Bitcoin ETF shares, but the meme stocks saw eye-popping gains.

entry.title: Robinhood Boasts $5 Billion One-Day Trading Volume In GameStop Frenzy
entry.summary: The trading app went offline overnight for upgrades to accommodate the rush of activity.

entry.title: Is GameStop Trader Roaring Kitty Actually Back—Or Are We Being Punked?
entry.summary: The meme stock influencer’s apparent return to Twitter has fueled billions of dollars worth of stock and crypto pumps. But are the posts really from Keith Gill?

entry.title: What Is Notcoin? The Telegram-Based Game, NOT Token, and Future Plans
entry.summary: UPDATE: The NOT token is launching on Thursday, May 16. Get up to speed on the viral Telegram-based game before then.

entry.title: Vanguard's New CEO Is Big on Bitcoin—Will the Wall Street Giant Embrace BTC ETFs?
entry.summary: Experts believe the new hire—who helped launch BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF—may change Vanguard's approach to crypto funds.

entry.title: Feds Arrest Crypto Bros for 'Attacking Ethereum' With MEV Exploit
entry.summary: Two brothers have been charged with allegedly "attacking Ethereum" via a MEV exploit that let them swipe $25 million within seconds.

entry.title: Solana Game 'Nyan Heroes' Reveals Token Launch Amid Play-to-Airdrop Push
entry.summary: Overwatch-style shooter Nyan Heroes will launch its NYAN token via Bybit next week, with airdrop details coming soon.

entry.title: GameStop Crashed 30%. Is the Roaring Kitty Rally Over?
entry.summary: Meme stocks that surged after the influencer’s apparent return online took a beating as markets opened on Wednesday.

entry.title: Ethereum Card Battler ‘Cross the Ages’ Launches CTA Token, Raises $3.5 Million
entry.summary: Previously backed by Ubisoft and Square Enix, Cross the Ages expands its crypto offerings with a new CTA token amid a fresh fundraise.

entry.title: Bitcoin Up 3.5% as US Data Shows Consumer Prices Slowed Their Climb in April
entry.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum and the wider crypto market saw gains on Wednesday following the U.S. CPI report showing prices rose slower than in March.

entry.title: Floki Inu Leads the Pack as Meme Coins Ride the Roaring Kitty Rally
entry.summary: But there's another explanation: A recently approved DAO proposal authorized the burning of $3.3 million worth of FLOKI tokens.

entry.title: You Can Now Invest in a Bitcoin Fund and Earn Yield—In Nordic Countries
entry.summary: The new yield-bearing Bitcoin fund offers a more than 5% return through secure staking via the BTC-powered Core Chain.

entry.title: Mika Explains the Bitcoin Halving
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer Mika explains the recent Bitcoin halving and how you can build your understanding through Kraken's Learn Center.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Steady Ahead of U.S. Consumer Prices Report
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Etheruem have been steady as economists forecast another disappointingly high Consumer Price Index report today.

entry.title: Ethereum Strategy Game 'Apeiron' Reveals $1 Million Esports Championship
entry.summary: Players could win their share of a big prize pool as part of a tournament in Hong Kong for the Ethereum and Ronin strategy game Apeiron.

entry.title: How Far Can Roaring Kitty’s Return Really Carry GameStop?
entry.summary: Meme stocks are blazing hot again with GameStop bull Roaring Kitty’s apparent return, but will his tweets alone sustain the hype?

entry.title: Solana Dev Confesses to Stealing, Gambling Away Cypher User Funds
entry.summary: The theft included over $314,674 in USDT, USDC, and Solana.

entry.title: Lucky GameStop, AMC Traders ‘Turned Thousands into Millions’
entry.summary: The sudden resurgence of meme stocks this week have made a small fortune for traders that may have never given up on the 2021 craze.

entry.title: Google Pushes Gemini AI Upgrades Into Everything, Steamrolling OpenAI's ChatGPT
entry.summary: Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro boasts a context window of 1 million multimodal tokens, dwarfing GPT-4's limit, as it amps up AI features across all of its services.

entry.title: Will Ethereum Be Declared a Security By the SEC Next Week?
entry.summary: Even as a deadline looms for spot Ethereum ETF applications, a firm answer on its regulatory status seems “unlikely,” analysts say.

entry.title: Xsolla Releases Quarterly Insights Report On The Future Of Gaming And Game Development: A Preliminary Analysis Of Spring 2024 Metrics And Upcoming Trends
entry.summary: Sherman Oaks, United States, May 14th, 2024, GamingWire Xsolla, a global video game commerce company, published the Spring 2024 edition of "The Xsolla Report: The State of Play” today. Launched on the heels of the Game Developers Conference (GDC) 2024, this extensive report provides invaluable insights into the emerging trends and pivotal shifts impacting the […]

entry.title: From ‘This is AGI’ to ‘I'm the Same’: OpenAI GPT-4o Reveal Meets Mixed Reactions
entry.summary: Elon Musk, who is building his own AI company, said OpenAI's presentation made him “cringe.” Others raved about its increased performance.

entry.title: Bitcoin’s Future Is ‘Bleak’ and Ripe for Regulation, Core Developer Says
entry.summary: Even after 15 years, Matt Corallo says Bitcoin still lacks trustless scaling solutions, and regulators are taking advantage of that.

entry.title: Lucky Timing? 'Roaring Kitty' Solana Meme Coin Skyrockets After GameStop Trader's Return
entry.summary: A Solana meme coin called Roaring Kitty promised big moves ahead—and then the famed GameStop trader reappeared, prompting a price surge.

entry.title: Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin: US Crypto Hostility Goes Beyond Biden, Gensler
entry.summary: Banking elites might have their fingerprints all over the current anti-crypto regulatory climate, the Consensys founder said in an executive interview with Decrypt.

entry.title: ‘Notcoin’ Airdrop Claim Opens as Binance Users Stake $14 Billion for NOT Rewards
entry.summary: Notcoin players on Telegram can now deposit or stake their tokens, as billions of NOT tokens are handed out through Binance and OKX.

entry.title: GameStop Tribute Meme Coin on Solana Surges to All-Time High Price
entry.summary: GME shares are surging, but the unofficial GameStop meme coin has marked even larger gains as trader Roaring Kitty apparently returns.

entry.title: Wisconsin State Holds $163 Million in BlackRock, Grayscale Bitcoin ETF Shares
entry.summary: The State of Wisconsin Investment Board has bought shares from both the BlackRock and Grayscale Bitcoin ETFs, a filing shows.

entry.title: Polymarket Raises $70 Million With Backing From Vitalik Buterin and Peter Thiel Fund
entry.summary: The blockchain-based betting site said it would contemplate U.S.-regulated options for speculators as well.

entry.title: Chain of Alliance Beta Launch Brings ‘Ground Up’ Overhaul
entry.summary: The turn-based RPG has completely reworked its combat and crafting systems, adding new visuals and an overhauled UI.

entry.title: My Neighbor Alice Season 1 Beta Goes Live
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator Orangie plays the new season of multiplayer builder-game My Neighbor Alice and tries out all its features.

entry.title: Solana Leads The Bounce
entry.summary: Crypto up despite ETF outflow, SOL outperforms. HK ETFs also see another net daily outflow. SOL flips ETH again in 24hr DEX volume. SOL revenue now 50% of ETH. Bitcoin above $1m by 2030: Dorsey. Bitcoin & Kucoin get license in India. Kraken tries to get SEC case dismissed. Stand with Crypto sets up election war chest. VIP customers make up two thirds of Binance volume. NOT to launch on Binance & OKX. TON up 20%, speculation it will be listed after NOT. Securitize & BlackRock look to launch on ARB. Franklin Templeton calls for ‘Base season’. EIGEN claims go live today, will be un-transferable. Eclipse founder leaves after harassment claims.

entry.title: Inside Manhattan’s Newest On-Chain Fashion Store: 9dcc
entry.summary: At NFT NYC, Decrypt’s Sander Lutz explored the on-chain fashion brand’s latest pop-up, and spoke to its founder Gmoney about 9dcc’s future expansion plans.

entry.title: BTC Sinks Lower
entry.summary: HK ETF volumes disappoint at $11M, crypto sinks. US ETFs see another $52M outflow, 4th straight day. EigenLayer FUD after 5% non-transferable airdrop. EigenLayer also geoblocks USA for claims. 5K+ withdrawals after EigenLayer announcement. Microstrategy bought another $8M BTC in April. Miner revenue drops to 2023 lows. Consensys vs SEC litigation will take years: Cowen. SEC had been investigating ETH for a year. Gensler may have misled Congress with ETH stance.KMNO hits $363M on launch. Decentralised Rune airdrop opens at $102M. Friend Tech airdrop delayed until Thursday. NFTfi airdrop claim today.

entry.title: A Very Red Week For Crypto
entry.summary: Majors hit locals lows, break key support levels. Liquidations hit $420M, funding remains neutral. ETFs saw $344M withdrawals in April. CZ gets 4-month jail sentence. FTX sells $232M locked SOL at ‘around $100’. Final integration of SOL Firedancer ‘well underway’. SOL, DOGE, XRP open interest down 51% in a month. BlackRock BUIDL largest tokenised treasury fund. Uniswap integrates with Robinhood connect. Stablecoin bill may be coming very soon. Gensler lied to Congress: McHenry. KSI steps back from crypto trading. Coinbase supports Lightning network. BCH creator arrested in Spain. EigenLayer sees 12K queued withdrawals.

entry.title: Solana Full Send
entry.summary: SOL leads majors higher, DEX volume flips ETH. ETH burn rate hits yearly low. BTC needs to reach $67k for a ‘higher high’. Robinhood receives Wells Notice from SEC. Only 10% of stablecoin transactions are real: Visa. May 15th will see corporate filings of BTC purchases. Hayes continues to OTC buy PENDLE. Cartier arrested for USDT money laundering. ENA up 20% on rumours of integrations.

entry.title: Memecoin Bounce
entry.summary: Crypto volatile but bounces after dovish Fed speech. ETFs see record $563m outflow. BlackRock ETF sees first outflow in 77 days. BlackRock expects more institutions to buy BTC. BNP bank buys BlackRock ETF. BTC continues to sit below STH average cost. Coinbase earnings today. Tether made $4.5bn profit in Q1. MicroStrategy building identity protocol on Ordinals. Dorsey’s Block Inc investigated in US. BlackRock leads investment in RWA firm. STX Nakamoto upgrade delayed by 8 weeks. LayerZero 1st snapshot taken ahead of airdrop.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Mike Demarais
entry.summary: Mike dropped knowledge bombs from years of building in the trenches alongside some deep cuts on the early Williamsburg crypto mafia.

entry.title: Eth Rally Fails
entry.summary: Crypto falls, ETH/BTC rally again marks mini sell-off. Yen carry-trade implosion linked to worries. ETH gas fees hit 6-month lows. 3rd straight week of institutional outflows. Slowing BTC ETF flows are just a pause: Bernstein. BTC now on track for 5 red weeks in a row. BTC may have topped, could hit $35k: Brandt. ETFs may become big sellers: Bianco. Consensys list 4 reasons ETH isn’t a security. Rumours continue to grow of EigenLayer airdrop. Perp DEX volumes continue fall, GMX underperforms. Wallets begin to block US users after Samourai case. WLD in reported partnership talks with OpenAI. Large unlocks this week for SUI, PYTH & MEME.

entry.title: Inside Sasha Stiles’ Experiential, AI-Infused NFT Drop with Bang & Olufsen
entry.summary: At a launch party for the collection in New York’s SoHo neighborhood, the artist broke down her latest art experiment, “Four Core Texts,” with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz.

entry.title: Interview: How 'Notcoin' Will Evolve After the NOT Token Launch
entry.summary: Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about how he envisions Notcoin's expansion and evolution after the token drop—into something akin to the "Netflix of social, viral games."

entry.title: Magic Runes
entry.summary: BTC stables at $66k, liquidations in narrow range. BTC funding again turns negative in bullish sign. ETFs net inflow after Grayscale moves to lower fees. BTC demand 5x vs supply post-halving: Bitfinex. SOL congestion issue now largely solved. Two SEC lawyers resign after ‘gross abuse of power’. Ripple fights to lower $2bn SEC fine. SAFE trades at $2.8bn FDV after OKX lists. MANEKI hits $150m on first day, China memes pump. Memecoins are ‘black hole you can’t ignore’. DeGods up 20%, may switch back to SOL. Magic Eden launches Runes platform ahead of time. Louis Vuitton gifts Pharrell jacket to NFT holders. Melania Trump launches necklace with SOL NFTs. Hoodie Punk trades for $620K.

entry.title: Luxury Watches, Designer Shoes Will Soon Trade Like NFTs: Arianee CEO
entry.summary: Arianee CEO Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel sat down with Rug Radio founder Farokh and Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at NFT Paris to discuss everything from the future of on-chain luxury to the secret hack to finding the best restaurants in France.

entry.title: Notcoin's Co-Creator Explains the Game's Token Delay—And When to Expect NOT Now
entry.summary: Notcoin co-creator Sasha Plotvinov spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai to discuss why the NOT token launch was pushed back from the original 4/20 target, when to expect the listing, and more.

entry.title: TON’s Justin Hyun Breaks Down The Importance of USDT Coming to Telegram
entry.summary: At Token 2049 in Dubai, The Open Network’s director of investments sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz to discuss what he sees as the game-changing integration of USDT onto TON, and his plans for getting Telegram’s 900 million users to start using crypto in the immediate future.

entry.title: Crypto Influencer Ansem Explains His Meme Coin Thesis and Why He’s Bullish on Bitcoin Runes
entry.summary: Ansem, the crypto trader who's amassed a sizable following on the back of meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) and other calls, chats with Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about his meme coin thesis, why he's bullish on Bitcoin Runes, and what he sees ahead for the crypto markets.

entry.title: Decrypt's Sander Lutz Braves the Dubai Floods for a Crypto Conference
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz reports from Dubai amid a historic storm that flooded the famed city, trudging through the streets to complete his essential task: Attending the Token 2049 crypto conference.
